trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Hickory
There were no other sightings in Hickory on or around March 21st 2013
Summary: object looked like a Ribbon twisting , rolling and moving width wise moving East to West covered my yard and out of sight in 5-7 seconds.
divs: sighting detailsi live in the ne section of hickory,nc. it was march 21st at 8:40pm i had walked outside at 8:22 pm looking for the pan starrs comet i was having no luck and was about to walk inside when i just happened to look up toward orion when something caught my eye. it was moving very fast, but i had enough time to look at it through my 10x40 binoculars for several seconds. it was twisting and rolling just like a ribbon or a snake but moving width wise east to west as if a strong wind was pushing it. the breeze was maybe 5 mph but blowing west to east, there was absolutely no sound. the object was self illuminated almost pulsating a dull gold\copper color but only on the bottom. like a light was shining on it from the ground but that wasn't the case. i started to run inside and call the local airport, but we are about to lose our airport's tower and i didn't want to bother them with a ufo report. the object passed over my yard and 2 of my neighbors yard toward a shopping center before it vanished from view. i do know geese fly at night but they don't glow or shimmer and they normally honk when they fly so they don't bump into each other, plus this wasn't a v shape. i live in a fly zone for the airport so i'm used to seeing aircraft at night, i'm guessing this was at least 1000 feet up and about 120 ft long like the 3 buses end to end give or take, but not very thick. ive seen several things i couldn't explain in the years past, but nothing like this and the effect it has had over me, i have been so on edge all day i just felt like i had to report it. i hope another backyard stargazer was as lucky as i and got to see it also. it was pretty amazing, i just wish i had taken my camera outside, but i hadn't.
